meanings.sent1: The new house was basementless, so there was no underground room.
meanings.sent2: The basementless building had only one floor.
meanings.sent3: The basementless house felt like it was missing a secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: Living in a basementless home made me appreciate natural light more.
meanings.sent5: The basementless structure seemed to defy the idea of hidden spaces.
